Class AdminConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • AdminConsole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdminConsole_I, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class AdminConsole
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements AdminConsole_I
    See Also:

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void change_election()
      Allows you to change the properties of an election All changes are passed to the rmi server
      void change_voter_data()
      Allows you to change the properties of a voter All changes are passed to the rmi server
      void create_election()
      Create a new election.
      void early_vote()
      Allows a voter to be able to vote in a election, before the official start date and time through the administration console.
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
      void manage_list()
      Allows you to change the properties of the lists of an election: - Create a new list - Delete a existing list - Insert a candidate in a list - Delete a candidate in a list All changes are passed to the rmi server
      void manage_table_members()
      Allows you to change the tables of an election: - Add new member to a table - Remove a member of a table All changes are passed to the rmi server
      void manage_tables()
      Allows you to change the tables of an election: - Add table to election - Remove table to election All changes are passed to the rmi server
      void menu()
      prints all the features available on the administration console
      void notify_state​(java.lang.String notification)
      prints a notification about the state (on or off) of a table
      void options_menu()
      handles all the features available in the administration console
      void reconnect()
      Recursive method that will try to recover the connetion with the rmi server when it fails
      void register_voter()
      Register a new voter.
      void see_results()
      Allows to see the results of a past election.
      void see_voters_local()
      Allows to know at which polling station and at what time each voter voted.
      void table_state()
      Print all the tables and their state
      void voters_real_time()
      prints the number of voters who have voted so far at each polling station for a chosen election
